column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Gyatso says : " Aang needs to have freedom and fun .
#Text=" Pasang says : " Gyatso , I know you mean well , but you are letting your affection for the boy cloud your judgment .
#Text=" Gyatso says : " All I want is what is best for him .
#Text=" Pasang says : " But what we need is what 's best for the world .
#Text=You and Aang must be separated !
#Text=The Avatar will be sent away to the Eastern Air Temple to complete his training .
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's awful , Aang .
#Text=I do n't know what to say .
#Text=" Aang says : " How could they do that to me ?
#Text=They wanted to take away everything I knew and everyone I loved !
#Text=" Katara says : " Whoa !
#Text=Hot cinders !
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm sorry I got so mad .
#Text=" Katara says : " You have the right to be angry after the monks sent you away like that .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , that 's not exactly what happened .
#Text=I was afraid and confused .
#Text=I did n't know what to do .
#Text=" Gyatso says : " Aang , I 'm not going to let them take you away from me .
#Text=Aang ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I never saw Gyatso again .
#Text=Next thing I knew , I was waking up in your arms after you found me in the iceberg .
#Text=" Katara says : " You ran away .
#Text=" Aang says : " And then the Fire Nation attacked our temple .
#Text=My people needed me and I was n't there to help .
#Text=" Katara says : " You do n't know what would have - .
#Text=" Aang says : " The world needed me and I was n't there to help .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang ... " Aang says : " The fisherman was right !
#Text=I did turn my back on the world !
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're being too hard on yourself , even if you did run away .
#Text=I think it was meant to be .
#Text=If you had stayed , you would have been killed along with all the other airbenders .
#Text=" Aang says : " You do n't know that .
#Text=" Katara says : " I know it was meant to be this way .
#Text=The world needs you now .
#Text=You give people hope .
#Text="
